verses.text: If \add one\add* be \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it, \w lying|strong="H5307"\w* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \add and\add* it be not \w known|strong="H3045"\w* who hath \w slain|strong="H5221"\w* him:

Then thy \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* and thy \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* shall come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, and they shall \w measure|strong="H4058"\w* unto the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* which \add are\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* him that is \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*:

And it shall be, \add that\add* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \add which is\add* \w next|strong="H7138"\w* unto the slain \w man|strong="H2491"\w*, even the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of that \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* an \w heifer|strong="H1241"\w*, which hath not been wrought \w with|strong="H5647"\w*, \add and\add* which hath not \w drawn|strong="H4900"\w* in the \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w*;

And the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of that \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall bring \w down|strong="H3381"\w* the \w heifer|strong="H5697"\w* unto a \w rough|strong="H0386"\w* \w valley|strong="H5158"\w*, which is neither \w eared|strong="H5647"\w* nor \w sown|strong="H2232"\w*, and shall strike \w off|strong="H6202"\w* the \w heifer’s|strong="H5697"\w* \w neck|strong="H6202"\w* there in the \w valley|strong="H5158"\w*:

And the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* shall come \w near|strong="H5066"\w*; for them the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* to \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* unto him, and to \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and by their \w word|strong="H6310"\w* shall every \w controversy|strong="H7379"\w* and every \w stroke|strong="H5061"\w* be \add tried:\add*  +  r 21.5  t word: Heb. mouth *

And all the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of that \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \add that are\add* \w next|strong="H7138"\w* unto the \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* \add man\add*, shall \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* over the \w heifer|strong="H5697"\w* that is \w beheaded|strong="H6202"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H5158"\w*:

And they shall \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Our \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* have not \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* this \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, neither have our \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*.

Be \w merciful|strong="H3722"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, unto thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, whom thou hast \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w*, and \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* not \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* unto thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w Israel’s|strong="H3478"\w* \w charge|strong="H7130"\w*. And the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* shall be \w forgiven|strong="H3722"\w* them.\f + \fr 21.8 \ft unto thy people of: Heb. in the midst, etc\f*

So shalt thou put \w away|strong="H1197"\w* the \add guilt of\add* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* from \w among|strong="H7130"\w* you, when thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which is\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ When thou goest \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w war|strong="H4421"\w* against thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* them into thine \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, and thou hast \w taken|strong="H7617"\w* them \w captive|strong="H7628"\w*,

And \w seest|strong="H7200"\w* among the \w captives|strong="H7633"\w* a \w beautiful|strong="H8389"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, and hast a \w desire|strong="H2836"\w* unto her, that thou wouldest have \w her|strong="H3947"\w* to thy \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*;

Then thou shalt \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* her \w home|strong="H8432"\w* to thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; and she shall \w shave|strong="H1548"\w* her \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and \w pare|strong="H6213"\w* her \w nails|strong="H6856"\w*;\f + \fr 21.12 \ft pare: or, suffer to grow: Heb. make, or, dress\f*

And she shall \w put|strong="H5493"\w* the \w raiment|strong="H8071"\w* of her \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w* from off her, and shall \w remain|strong="H3427"\w* in thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w bewail|strong="H1058"\w* her \w father|strong="H0001"\w* and her \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* a \w full|strong="H3117"\w* \w month|strong="H3391"\w*: and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that thou shalt \w go|strong="H0935"\w* in unto her, and be her \w husband|strong="H1166"\w*, and she shall be thy \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.

And it shall be, if thou have no \w delight|strong="H2654"\w* in her, then thou shalt let her \w go|strong="H7971"\w* whither she \w will|strong="H5315"\w*; but thou shalt not \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* her at \w all|strong="H4376"\w* for \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, thou shalt not make \w merchandise|strong="H6014"\w* of her, \w because|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast \w humbled|strong="H6031"\w* her.

¶ If a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* have \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w beloved|strong="H0157"\w*, and \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w hated|strong="H8130"\w*, and they have \w born|strong="H3205"\w* him \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \add both\add* the \w beloved|strong="H0157"\w* and the \w hated|strong="H8130"\w*; and \add if\add* the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* be hers that was \w hated|strong="H8146"\w*:

Then it shall be, \w when|strong="H3117"\w* he maketh his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* to \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w* \add that\add* which he hath, \add that\add* he \w may|strong="H3201"\w* not make the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w beloved|strong="H0157"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1069"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w hated|strong="H8130"\w*, \add which is indeed\add* the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*:

But he shall \w acknowledge|strong="H5234"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* \add for\add* the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*, by \w giving|strong="H5414"\w* him a \w double|strong="H8147"\w* \w portion|strong="H6310"\w* of all that he \w hath|strong="H4672"\w*: for he \add is\add* the \w beginning|strong="H7225"\w* of his \w strength|strong="H0202"\w*; the \w right|strong="H4941"\w* of the \w firstborn|strong="H1062"\w* \add is\add* his.\f + \fr 21.17 \ft that…: Heb. that is found with him\f*

¶ If a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* have a \w stubborn|strong="H5637"\w* and \w rebellious|strong="H4784"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, which will not \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, or the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, and \add that\add*, when they have \w chastened|strong="H3256"\w* him, will not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto them:

Then shall his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* and his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* lay \w hold|strong="H8610"\w* on him, and bring him \w out|strong="H3318"\w* unto the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of his \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and unto the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of his \w place|strong="H4725"\w*;

And they shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of his \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, This our \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \add is\add* \w stubborn|strong="H5637"\w* and \w rebellious|strong="H4784"\w*, he will not \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* our \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*; \add he is\add* a \w glutton|strong="H2151"\w*, and a \w drunkard|strong="H5433"\w*.

And all the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of his \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall \w stone|strong="H7275"\w* him with \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, that he \w die|strong="H4191"\w*: so shalt thou \w put|strong="H1197"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w away|strong="H1197"\w* from \w among|strong="H7130"\w* you; and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, and \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*.

¶ And if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* have committed a \w sin|strong="H2399"\w* worthy \w of|strong="H4941"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, and he be to be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*, and thou \w hang|strong="H8518"\w* him on a \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*:

His \w body|strong="H5038"\w* shall not remain all \w night|strong="H3885"\w* upon the \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, but thou shalt in any \w wise|strong="H6912"\w* \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* him that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*; (for he that is \w hanged|strong="H8518"\w* \add is\add* \w accursed|strong="H7045"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*;) that thy \w land|strong="H0127"\w* be not \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee \add for\add* an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.\f + \fr 21.23 \ft accursed…: Heb. the curse of God\f*
